quotes.quote: A fantastic positive ATTITUDE makes a great day! SMILE!
One of the more fantastic possibilities is that man will be able to make biological carbon copies of himself.
What's fantastic is that there's a real growing appreciation for performance-capture technology as a tool for acting.
It is fantastic to be found in a foreign country.
The more fantastic an ideology or theology, the more fanatic its adherents.
The fantastic cannot exist independently of that 'real' world which it seems to find frustratingly finite.
A fantastic model of collaboration: thinking partners who aren't echo chambers.
It's not that I wear fantastic clothes, it's just that clothes look fantastic on me.
There are a few really fantastic stories left, and that kind of gives you some inspiration to find even new ones.
It's a fantastic thing to take the risk of getting so close to your desire, expressing your obsession so absolutely.
Here we are in this wholly fantastic universe with scarcely a clue as to whether our existence has any real significance.
Fantastic things happen - to the way we feel, to the way we make other people feel. All this simply by using positive words.
One of the fantastic things about books, fiction or non-fiction, is the way they give you a chance to look into different lives.
It's fantastic to put your hands in the earth. I enjoy spending my time in heaven here. I don't care what you say, this is my heaven.
It's fantastic that the world is becoming more open to different ways of working, but we still have a long way to go in terms of changing perceptions.
There is incredible value in being of service to others.
It is incredible how rich you can get by not being perfect.
The most incredible thing about miracles is that they happen.
You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
There is, in fact, an incredible freedom in having nothing left to lose.
Incredible things can be done simply if we are committed to making them happen.
It's incredible to have people show their support when your doing something you love.
It is incredible, when you start believing in angels your life becomes a lot smoother.
The incredible thing about the human mind is that is didn't come with an instruction book.
A thing may be incredible and still be true; sometimes it is incredible because it is true.
A thing is incredible, if ever, only after it is told -- returned to the world it came out of.
It's incredible to realize that what we do each day has meaning in the big picture of God's plan.
It's incredible how many emotions you feel when crossing the finish line and seeing that you are No. 1.
The most incredible beauty and the most satisfying way of life come from affirming your own uniqueness.
There is incredible generosity in the potentialities of Nature. We only have to discover how to utilize them.
Anything that we think is incredible and beautiful and wonderful, we ascribe to something that we don't know what it is.
It's incredible how nature sets females up to take care of people, and yet it is tricky for them to take care of themselves.
It's so fantastic for young kids to see a superhero going through the things they go through.
It's just fantastic to go out and meet people in the world and get to really remote places.
It's fantastic because I've been living thousands of lives, not only my life.
In science fiction a fantastic event or development is considered rationally.
The strangest and most fantastic fact about negative emotions is that people actually worship them.
It is so fantastic being an actress because you have the chance to be a thousand different people when you act.
Fantastic fiction covers fantasy, horror and science fiction - and it doesn't get the attention it deserves from the literati.
Our fantastic civilization has fallen out of touch with many aspects of nature, and with none more completely than with night.
I know that the fantastic amount of profit that people want to make on anything is damaging. And that none of us seem able to resist it.
It seems a fantastic paradox, but it is nevertheless a most important truth, that no architecture can be truly noble which is not imperfect.
It's fantastic to have the opportunity to work abroad, and do all that, but there is a certain point where you're just like, 'Oh, I'd love to work at home.'
There is incredible power in the arts to inspire and influence.
People do incredible things for love, particularly for unrequited love.
It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
It's incredible how much intelligence is used in this world to prove nonsense.
You are an incredible child of God having a dream that you are a human being on a tiny planet in the middle of nowhere.
